title: Manage Trade Agreements

modifiers.buttonLabel: +5 DC Increase managed on previous turn
modifiers.name: Managed Trade Agreements last turn

description: You send agents out to attend to established trade agreements. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-points" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="true" data-value="2">Lose 2 Resource Points</button> per Trade Agreement you wish to manage. Then attempt a basic check. If you Managed Trade Agreements on the previous turn, increase this DC by 5.

criticalSuccess.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="true" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Dice Next Turn</button> per trade agreement, and 1 Commodity of your choice per trade agreement (no more than half of these Commodities may be Luxuries).

success.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="true" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Dice Next Turn</button> per trade agreement, or 1 Commodity of your choice per trade agreement (no more than half of these Commodities may be Luxuries).

failure.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-points" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="true" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Points Next Turn</button> per trade agreement
